00039 #ifndef ORO_CONN_INPUT_ENDPOINT_HPP
00040 #define ORO_CONN_INPUT_ENDPOINT_HPP
00041 
00042 #include "Channels.hpp"
00043 
00044 namespace RTT
00045 { namespace internal {
00046 
00050     template<typename T>
00051     class ConnInputEndpoint : public base::ChannelElement<T>
00052     {
00053         OutputPort<T>* port;
00054         ConnID* cid;
00055 
00056     public:
00057         ConnInputEndpoint(OutputPort<T>* port, ConnID* id)
00058             : port(port), cid(id) { }
00059 
00060         ~ConnInputEndpoint()
00061         {
00062             //this->disconnect(false); // inform port (if any) we're gone.
00063             delete cid;
00064         }
00065 
00066         using base::ChannelElement<T>::read;
00067 
00071         virtual FlowStatus read(typename base::ChannelElement<T>::reference_t sample)
00072         { return NoData; }
00073 
00074         virtual bool inputReady() {
00075             return true;
00076         }
00077 
00078         virtual void disconnect(bool forward)
00079         {
00080             // Call the base class first
00081             base::ChannelElement<T>::disconnect(forward);
00082 
00083             OutputPort<T>* port = this->port;
00084             if (port && !forward)
00085             {
00086                 this->port   = 0;
00087                 port->removeConnection( cid );
00088             }
00089         }
00090 
00091         virtual base::PortInterface* getPort() const {
00092             return this->port;
00093         }
00094 
00095     };
00096 
00097 }}
00098 
00099 #endif
